Welcome to Gordon¶

Welcome to Gordon’s documentation. I recommend that you get started with Installation and then head over to the Quickstart. Besides the Quickstart, there are also several tutorials for some of the different available integrations.

Integrations¶

Apart from creating lambdas, gordon can help you wiring your lambdas with lot’s of different AWS services.

  • Dynamodb
  • Kinesis
  • S3
